text.en: Plants of the coastal sage scrub
Select a detail to see the painting and the plant
text.es: Nullam dapibus sit amet massa non tincidunt.

text.en: All of these plants painted by A.R. Valentien can be found at Torrey Pines State Natural Reserve and other places where coastal sage scrub habitat grows.
text.es: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aenean et lorem sapien. Etiam laoreet vehicula quam non lobortis. Nullam dapibus sit amet massa non tincidunt. Vivamus nibh massa, facilisis a interdum ornare, tincidunt vitae augue.

text.en: Often the dominant plant in large swaths of chaparral, chamise is a resinous plant that contributes to the fire hazard in these areas. It is most appealing when its branches are tipped with plumes of tiny white flowers.
text.es: Spanish description of 22-Our_Lords_Candle here. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aenean et lorem sapien. Etiam laoreet vehicula quam non lobortis.
